post: The Civics Fair is about more than prizes, its about impact. Students will showcase service projects that strengthen communities and pitch ideas to solve real challenges. Join us Oct. 11 at UCF for the Florida MyImpact Challenge. Register today:  https://bit.ly/45YV1rx  #FloridaStudents  #MyImpactChallenge  #CivicLeadership  #ServiceLearning  #CommunityImpact

📜  #OTD in 1877, Chief Joseph of the Nez Perce surrendered to U. S. forces after months of resistance. His speech, I will fight no more forever,  remains one of the most powerful in American history. How can we help students understand this moment of loss and resilience? 🔗 Discover this lesson:  https://bit.ly/3KxzyxE  #TDiH  #NativeAmericanHistory  #CivicEducation  #AmericanHistory

What do you gain from the Florida Civics Fair? ✅ Leadership experience ✅ AP Gov applied civics project credit ✅ Prizes up to $2,000 Students across Florida will showcase their service projects Oct. 11 at UCF. Register:  https://bit.ly/45YV1rx  #FloridaStudents  #MyImpactChallenge  #CivicEducation  #ServiceLearning

Meet Veronica Pitts, our 2025–26 National Civics Teacher of the Year. From growing up in a military family to teaching in Selma, she inspires students to see their own power and voice in civic life. Watch her story:  https://bit.ly/48Jya4Y  #CivicEducation  #TeachingMatters  #CivicLeadership

Choose your state. Change a classroom. With Civics Champion, every $1 puts a Pocket Constitution into a students hands, right where civic learning happens. Which state will you back today? Give now:  https://bit.ly/40EsBAg  #CivicsChampion  #CivicEducation  #SupportTeachers  #StatePride

How do we prepare students to live out the ideals of liberty, equality, and justice? In this lesson, Theodore Roosevelts call for active citizenship challenges middle schoolers to connect civic duty with constitutional principles. 🔗  https://bit.ly/4mLPvhk  #CivicEducation  #CivicLearning  #StudentEngagement  #America250  #TeachingResources

Were honored to announce a $750,000 grant from Carnegie Corporation of New York to expand access to debate resources and programs for teachers and students. This investment will enable BRI to equip the next generation with the skills to lead with civic virtue. 🔗  https://bit.ly/4gQwNU4  #CivicEducation  #CivicEngagement  #TeachingResources  #Democracy  #Philanthropy  #Carnegie

Did you know? The Civic Star Challenge has over 300 prize opportunities this year. Small wins add up to big recognition for your students and school. Why wait? 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #America250  #Teachers

October is here, and so is your chance to shine! The Florida MyImpact Challenge Civics Fair will showcase student service projects and civic ideas from across the state. Compete for up to $2,000 in prizes at UCF on Oct. 11! Register today:  https://bit.ly/45YV1rx  #FloridaStudents  #MyImpactChallenge  #CivicLeadership  #ServiceLearning  #YouthLeadership

How did early colonists begin to govern themselves? In this middle school civics video, students explore the Mayflower Compact as a foundation for American self-government, building historical thinking skills for DBQ success. 🎥 Watch now:  https://bit.ly/4pMuqFV  #CivicEducation  #MiddleSchoolHistory  #MayflowerCompact  #SelfGovernment
